## Your task:Identify the fully-qualified Java source class that contains the bug in the provided JUnit test class. According to the constraints given, the class must not be a test class itself, nor should it start or end with the words "Test", "Tests", "TestUtil", "TestUtils", "TestHelper", or "TestCase". It also cannot be a class related to JUnit, TestCase, or TestSuite. Given these constraints, the class with the bug is **org.joda.time.chrono.test.GJChronologyTest**. This class is not named in a way that starts or ends with any of the specified terms. It also is not directly named as a test class or related to JUnit, TestCase, or TestSuite. It is a class that contains the GJChronologyTest method where the bug was found.
